page.title: 16Friday is my Favourite Day
page.content: My name is Mark Haynes,I am 9 years old and go to Hanley Swan Primary School.My favourite day is Friday. I get up at approximately 7:30a.m.and have breakfast, either Cornflakes, or Weetabix.I say goodbye to Dad as he goes to work,then play with my scalextric until it is time to walk to school.I am usually the first there, and I play in the playground telling the boys and girls last night's news. When the bell rings we go to assembly and on Friday the Vicar comes to take the service. Lessons are usually maths and english and an exciting BBC T.V. programme called "Look and Read".We bring sandwiches as there is no school meal service.I have four sandwiches,a cake and a chocolate biscuit.After there is time to play football before making models in craft lesson in the afternoon.
